titles.title: To direct the United States Postal Service to place within ZIP Code 92880 any area of Eastvale, California, that is not within such ZIP Code, and for other purposes.
To direct the United States Postal Service to place within ZIP Code 92880 any area of Eastvale, California, that is not within such ZIP Code, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Reform.

bill.summary: This bill directs the U.S. Postal Service to include all of Eastvale, California, in ZIP Code 92880.
